prompt: Create a responsive navigation bar with a hamburger menu for mobile using Tailwind CSS and React.
Build a pricing table component with a toggle for monthly/yearly billing.
Create a 'Contact Us' form with Zod validation for email and message length.
Implement a dark mode toggle that persists preference in localStorage.
Create a reusable Modal component accessible via keyboard (ESC to close).
Design a Supabase schema for a Todo app with RLS policies allowing only owner access.
Create a Next.js Server Action to update a user's profile with Zod validation.
Write a SQL query to find the top 10 users by 'karma' points in the last 7 days.
Set up a Stripe webhook handler that verifies the signature.
Create an Edge Function to resize uploaded avatar images to 150x150px.
Audit the 'src/app/api/admin/users/route.ts' file for IDOR vulnerabilities.
Write a Zod schema for a user registration form enforcing strong password rules.
Check the repository for any leaked API keys or secrets in .env files.
Explain how to secure a Supabase database against unauthorized public access.
Simulate an SQL injection attack against the search endpoint to verify immunity.
Optimize the landing page hero image to pass Core Web Vitals LCP.
Analyze the bundle size and suggest opportunities for code splitting.
Implement a caching strategy for the 'Get All Products' API endpoint.
Replace Moment.js with date-fns in the project to reduce JS payload.
Configure 'next/font' to optimize Google Fonts loading.
Translate 'I want a Tinder for cats' into a detailed technical specification.
Refine the prompt 'Build a dashboard' into a specific comprehensive task description.
Generate a prompt for a hyper-realistic cyber-punk street scene.
Create a React Native screen with a flatlist of users.
Package the current web app as an Electron application.
